channel.title: NFL on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in NFL on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Shannon Sharpe Wanted ESPN Exit News to Wait Until After Brother’s Football Hall of Fame Induction
item.description: “I’m sorry that I upstaged you in this manner. You know that was never my intent," the former NFL star said, addressing his sibling.

item.title: Shannon Sharpe Wanted ESPN Exit News to Wait Until After Brother’s Football Hall of Fame Induction
item.description: “I’m sorry that I upstaged you in this manner. You know that was never my intent," the former NFL star said, addressing his sibling.

item.title: NFL Employee “Seriously Injured” in New York Office Shooting, Security to Be Increased
item.description: Commissioner Roger Goodell, who updated the league’s staff Monday night, told employees they should work remotely on Tuesday.

item.title: NFL Employee “Seriously Injured” in New York Office Shooting, Security to Be Increased
item.description: Commissioner Roger Goodell, who updated the league’s staff Monday night, told employees they should work remotely on Tuesday.

item.title: NFL Employee ‘Seriously Injured’ in Shooting at NYC Office Building
item.description: An employee of the NFL, whose headquarters are in the New York City building targeted in a deadly shooting Monday, was “seriously injured” in the attack, league commissioner Roger Goodell

item.title: Roku Snags Documentary on Philadelphia Eagles Super Bowl Win (Exclusive)
item.description: ‘Super Bowl Champions: The 2024 Philadelphia Eagles,’ is from NFL Films and Dan Silver’s BD4 Productions, and chronicles the team’s journey.
